    • shoot

      public boolean shoot(int targetId, String shotCoordinate)
      Shoots at the specified target with the given shot coordinate.
      Parameters:
      targetId - The ID of the target (1 for player, 2 for enemy).
      shotCoordinate - The coordinate where the shot is being fired.
      Returns:
      True if the shot was valid and executed, false otherwise.

    • shootAtPlayer

      public void shootAtPlayer()
      Initiates a shot at the player's board by the computer opponent.

    • connectToServer

      public void connectToServer(String url, int port) throws Exception
      Connects to the server using the specified URL and port, retrieves necessary data, and initializes the online game.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the server.
      port - The port number for the connection.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the connection.

    • shootOnline

      public void shootOnline(String coordinate) throws Exception
      Shoots at the opponent's board in the online game.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - The coordinate where the shot is being fired.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the shooting process.
